newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Centennial, MUI to list shares.
newsitem.headline: Centennial, MUI to list shares.

text.p: Centennial City Inc and MUI Resources Philippines Inc will list additional shares on October 2, the Philippine Stock Exchange said on Wednesday.

Centennial City, formerly Guoco Land (Philippines) Inc, will list 4 billion common shares to cover the company's stock swap agreement with Amari Coastal Bay Development Corp, a firm which will develop 150 hectares of reclaimed land in Manila Bay.

Property developer MUI Resources Philippines Inc, formerly Shangri-La Properties Inc, will list 24.33 million shares to cover the rights offering to stockholders of record as of March 7, 1995. - Manila newsroom 63 2 841-8937 fax 8176267
